Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Collects, preserves and makes accessible printed material on all aspects of life in Sheffield and the surrounding area, past and present. Includes newspapers and press cuttings, maps, photographs and illustrations, printed ephemera, census and other statistics, voters lists, sound recordings, film and videos. Facilities include photocopier, microfilm/microfiche reader/printer (bookable), Picture Sheffield digital picture system, VHS/DVD video viewing facilities and digital copying service. Picture Sheffield also available to search on internet (www.picturesheffield.com). Produces the News from Sheffield Archives and Local Studies publication. Organises talks and events on local and family history and introduction to using the library. Provides 5 People's Network computers (including 1 large screen) with Microsoft Office and Internet access, free Ancestry.com website, available for public use.
